Event.Message:
Audio and video playback redirection cannot occur on the client computer because the Remote Desktop Connection version is too low.
Server version: %1 Client version: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="UInt32_1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UInt32_2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UInt32_3" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UInt32_4" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Server version: %1 Client version: %2 Server supported platforms: %3 Client supported platforms: %4
For platforms, the value is a bitmask where MF=0x01, and DShow=0x02.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="UInt32_1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UInt32_2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UInt32_3" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UInt32_4" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The client computer supports the format being proposed by the server.
Major Type: %2 %1 Sub-Type: %4 %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Guid1" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="String1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Guid2" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="String2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UInt32_1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message:
The client computer does not support the format being proposed by the server.
Major Type: %2 %1 Sub-Type: %4 %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Guid1" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="String1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Guid2" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="String2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UInt32_1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message:
A format was successfully applied for stream ID %5.
Major Type: %2 %1 Sub-Type: %4 %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Guid1" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="String1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Guid2" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="String2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UInt32_1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: An application with process name %1 tried to redirect media but did not meet the requirements to redirect media.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StringParameter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: An application with process name %1 meets all conditions to redirect media.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StringParameter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Audio and video playback redirection is allowed by both the client and server computers.
Audio and video playback redirection was disabled because of a licensing issue.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StringParameter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UInt32Parameter" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Audio and video playback redirection was disabled by using Group Policy.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StringParameter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UInt32Parameter" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Audio and video playback redirection was disabled on the client computer by using Remote Desktop Connection.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StringParameter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UInt32Parameter" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Audio and video playback redirection was disabled.
Reason: %1 (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StringParameter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UInt32Parameter" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StringParameter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UInt32Parameter" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StringParameter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UInt32Parameter" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
